title: Is social media ready for a vaccine?
description:
With a Covid-19 vaccine now closer than ever, Big Pharma is gearing up for vaccine approval. But what about big tech? Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains how the platforms are preparing for a flurry of new vaccine misinformation.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
